author: .paulharris
content:
one note for beacon_api implementers...
https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Beacon/publishBlock and blinded block both support SSZ, and use content-type to indicate SSZ is on the stream.... if you don't handle SSZ, please at least respond with 415 so that the caller can try again with json, this will help interop

author: sproul
content: New query parameter for block validation before broadcast, looking for feedback: <https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/317>
